name: Ring Blade
description:
Ring Blade is an arcade shooter that tests your reactions and nerves across 30 levels of frenetic action. The “flick-fire” mechanic adds a tactile response that allows you to enjoy the intense, arcade shooter experience without any fingers blocking the action.

*** PRESS QUOTES ***
"Ring Blade, from MindTrip Studios, is a mobile game right in the sweet spot of any shooter fan with an iPhone." - Kotaku

"Ring Blade is cool, inventive and challenging, and works within the vertical shooter/bullet hell genre while adding a lot to the conversation." - Appolicious

"Ring Blade offers an original control system and an impressive graphical style, as well as bullet hell fun." - 148Apps

*** FEATURES ***
No unnatural virtual sticks. No fingers blocking the action. Just finger-flickin’ fun!

Unique tribal tattoo art style and stylized graphics.

Giant, screen-filling bosses and dozens of varied enemies!

30 levels of fast-paced, frenetic, arcade-style action

OpenFeint enabled for high scores and achievements

*** BACKGROUND ***
In the deepest recesses of your mind, somewhere between madness and reason, lies a place where thought becomes creation. Trapped inside you have the only weapon you need – the Ring Blade. Master your fear. Free your mind. Fight or Die!
